TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEditableCollectionViewAddNewItem implements class System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView

summary.span: 定义 所实现的方法和属性，它们可用于指定添加特定类型的项。

span.span: Defines methods and properties that a implements to enable specifying adding items of a specific type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口使应用程序开发人员能够指定要添加到集合对象的类型。The interface enables application developers to specify what type of object to add to a collection. 此接口扩展，因此您可以添加、 编辑和删除集合中的项。This interface extends , so you can add, edit, and remove items in a collection. 将添加方法，采用对象添加到集合。 adds the method, which takes an object that is added to the collection. 此方法很有用，当集合和你想要添加的对象的一个或多个以下特征：This method is useful when the collection and objects that you want to add have one or more of the following characteristics: - 中的对象是不同的类型。The objects in the are different types. - 对象没有默认构造函数。The objects do not have a default constructor. - 该对象已经存在。The object already exists. - 你想要添加`null`到集合的对象。You want to add a `null` object to the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例使用户能够将各种类型的项添加到集合。The following example enables a user to add various types of items to a collection. 用户可以输入新的项目并提交该条目，或者取消该事务。The user can enter a new item and submit the entry or cancel the transaction. 此示例获取从属性和创建的对象，其类型由用户确定。The example gets an from the property of a and creates an object, whose type is determined by the user. 然后，该示例调用方法将该对象添加到集合。Then the example calls the method to add the object to the collection. [!code-csharp[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#MainWindowLogic](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#mainwindowlogic)] [!code-vb[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#MainWindowLogic](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mainwindowlogic)] 下面的示例创建了前面的示例的用户界面。The following example creates the user interface for the previous example. [!code-xaml[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#MainWindowXaml](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/csharp/window1.xaml#mainwindowxaml)] 下面的示例创建`AddItemWindow`用户将添加新项的数据。The following example creates the `AddItemWindow` in which the user adds data for a new item. [!code-xaml[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#AddItemXaml](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/csharp/additem.xaml#additemxaml)] 下面的示例演示的逻辑`AddItemWindow`。The following example shows the logic for the `AddItemWindow`. [!code-csharp[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#AddItemLogic](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/csharp/additem.xaml.cs#additemlogic)] [!code-vb[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#AddItemLogic](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/visualbasic/additemwindow.xaml.vb#additemlogic)] 下面的示例在前面的示例显示了数据类型和使用的集合。The following example shows the data types and collection that is used in the previous examples. [!code-csharp[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#Data](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/csharp/data.cs#data)] [!code-vb[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#Data](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/visualbasic/data.vb#data)]

Public Function AddNewItem (newItem As Object) As Object

param.name: newItem
param.span: 要添加到集合中的对象。

span.span: The object to add to the collection.

summary.span: 将指定的对象添加到集合。

span.span: Adds the specified object to the collection.
The object that is added to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你调用方法，它将开始添加事务。When you calling the method, it begins an add transaction. 应调用或方法来结束添加事务。You should call the or methods to end the add transaction. 始终在集合视图中将出现一个新项。A new item always appears in the collection view. 任何筛选、 排序或分组操作也将应用于该视图应用到新项时调用。Any filtering, sorting, or grouping that is applied to the view is applied to the new item when is called. ## Examples 下面的示例调用方法将对象添加到集合。The following example calls the method to add an object to a collection. 有关完整示例，请参阅类。For the complete example, see the class. [!code-csharp[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#MainWindowLogic](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#mainwindowlogic)] [!code-vb[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#MainWindowLogic](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mainwindowlogic)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanAddNewItem As Boolean
public: property bool CanAddNewItem { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以向集合中添加指定的对象。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a specified object can be added to the collection.

value.span: 如果可以将指定的对象添加到集合中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a specified object can be added to the collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性是`true`，你可以指定通过调用添加到集合的对象方法。If the property is `true`, you can specify an object to add to the collection by calling the method. 是`false`如果无法通过使用添加到集合项。 is `false` if items cannot be added to the collection by using . 如果是`false`，你可能仍将能够通过使用添加对象方法。If is `false`, you may still be able to add an object by using the method. 例如，你可以通过将对象添加到 ADO.NET 源使用，但不能通过使用。For example, you can add objects to an ADO.NET source by using , but not by using .
